title: Conditional test dependencies not added to spec
body:
Something major must have broken very recently, because this bug didn't exist 3 weeks ago when I was working on #12170.

I'm trying to install numpy, but when I run the unit tests, it turns out `pytest` isn't added as a dependency. The package contains:
```python
    depends_on('py-nose@1.0.0:', when='@:1.14', type='test')                    
    depends_on('py-pytest', when='@1.15:', type='test')    
```
